titleStmt.title: Of the rich man and Lazarus Certaine sermons, by Robert Horne.
titleStmt.author: Horne, Robert, 1565-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ber: Alsop for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with title "Certaine sermons, of the rich man and Lazarus".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
